title: Your Secret Self: How to Unfetter the Person You Were Meant to be
description: There is more to you than meets the eye. Perhaps there is more than you even imagined! In 'Your Secret Self' the author lays out how you are a multi-dimensional being. At your fingertips are powerful tools that, when utilized, will allow you to accomplish your fondest dreams! These tools are neglected by most people and as a result they live far below their potential. In this book the author lays out what these tools are and gives step by step instructions on how to use them. Through the principles contained in this book, you can turn your possibilities into realities. You can live a rich and fulfilling life, and become the person you were meant to be.
author: Christina Bellsmith
